title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 351.3 - Required approval of facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 351.3 - Required approval of facility

State Regulations

Insofar as practicable, assistance and care for a needy
person shall be provided in his own home, or in an approved facility suitable
to the needs of the person in accordance with department regulations relating
thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
351.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
